availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George A. Little (Daviess, KY, capt 17th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Wesley M. Little. Resident of Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from December 31, 1861, to April 1, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 431B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 303.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Application #1012702, Certificate #765765.
Find A Grave, "George Little (1839-1913)," Memorial #82243701, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82243701 (accessed July 30, 2020).
